The conference will consist of the contributions of the 22<br>EAEPE research areas as well as of a particular general theme selected for<br>this year. The 2015 conference theme will focus on reforming the financial<br>system in order to divert resources from speculative activities, cause of<br>growing inequalities and instability, [...] Urquhart, Neil 2015-03-05T11:29:53+00:00 2015-03-05T11:29:53+00:00 Young OR19 - Metaheuristics Stream - Call for papers https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EVOLUTIONARY-COMPUTING;731f1750.1503 Dear All,<br>This is to ask if you (or any collegues) would consider submitting an abstract to the Young OR metaheuristics stream? This year's event is to be held at Conference Aston Meeting Suites (CAMS) at Aston University Business School, Birmingham, B4 7ET<br><br>The Metaheuristics stream will examine the usage of metaheuristics within the OR field to solve and optimise problems. Metaheuristic techniques for discussion could include (but are not restricted to):<br>Evolutionary Algorithms<br>Genetic Programming<br>Iterated Local Search<br>Artificial Immune Systems<br>Ant Colony Optimisation<br>Simulated Annealing<br>Tabu Search [...] Wagner Stefan 2015-03-04T23:37:42+00:00 2015-03-04T23:37:42+00:00 Call for Papers: Workshop on Evolutionary Computation Software Systems (EvoSoft) @ GECCO 2015 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EVOLUTIONARY-COMPUTING;5a012188.1503 WORKSHOP ON EVOLUTIONARY COMPUTATION SOFTWARE SYSTEMS (EvoSoft)<br><br>to be held as part of the<br><br>2015 Genetic and Evolutionary Computation Conference (GECCO 2015)<br>July 11-15, Madrid, Spain<br><br>Organized by ACM SIGEVO<br>http://www.sigevo.org/gecco-2015<br><br>Submission deadline for this workshop: April 3rd, 2015<br><br>DESCRIPTION & TOPICS:<br>Evolutionary computation (EC) methods are applied in many different<br>domains. Therefore soundly engineered, reusable, flexible, user-friendly,<br>and interoperable software systems are more than ever required to bridge<br>the gap between theoretical research and practical application. However,<br>due to the heterogeneity of the application domains and the large number<br>of EC methods, the development of such systems is both, [...] Manuel L\ufffd\ufffdpez-Ib\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdez 2015-03-04T16:25:12+01:00 2015-03-04T16:25:12+01:00 Workshop on Automatically Configurable Algorithmic Frameworks (GECCO 2015) (deadline April 3rd) https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EVOLUTIONARY-COMPUTING;adf67bf6.1503 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=EVOLUTIONARY-COMPUTING;adf67bf6.1503">Workshop on Automatically Configurable Algorithmic Frameworks (GECCO 2015) (deadline April 3rd) </a> A. The NASA Formal<br>Methods Symposium is a forum for theoreticians and practitioners from<br>academia, industry, and government, with the goals of identifying<br>challenges and providing solutions to achieving assurance in mission- and<br>safety-critical systems.
